meanings.definition: The study of the rules for combining words into grammatically sensible sentences.
meanings.sent1: Learning about syntactics helps us understand how to make sentences correctly.
meanings.sent2: Good syntactics is essential for clear communication in writing.
meanings.sent3: The syntactics class was so interesting that I didn't want to leave.
meanings.sent4: In the world of language, syntactics is like the blueprint for building sentences.
meanings.sent5: Her explanation of syntactics made it all seem so simple and logical.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of words and phrases to create well-formed sentences in a language.
meanings.sent1: His syntactics in writing always impresses his teachers.
meanings.sent2: Understanding syntactics is crucial for effective communication.
meanings.sent3: The syntactics of the poem gave it a unique rhythm and flow.
meanings.sent4: In storytelling, syntactics can be compared to the structure of a house.
meanings.sent5: The syntactics of the language were beautifully illustrated in the book.
